titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Overseas Development Council records FA788

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-09-02 19:52:23 -0400.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research with select materials restricted as noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC. Researchers interested in accessing digital media (floppy disks, CDs, DVDs, etc.) or audiovisual material (audio cassettes, VHS, etc.) in this collection must use an access surrogate. The original items may not be accessed because of preservation concerns. To request an access surrogate be made, or if you are unsure if there is an access surrogate, please contact an archivist.

arrangement.head: Arrangement note
arrangement.p: The Overseas Development Council Records are organized into 14 series:

Series 1: Vital Records Series 2: Board and Council Records Series 3: Meetings Series 4: Fundraising Series 5: Country Files Series 6: Kudos, Testimony, and Speeches Series 7: Press Clippings Series 8: Proposals and Projects Series 9: Corporations Series 10: Foundations Series 11: International Organizations Series 12: Publications Series 13: Financial Records Series 14: Photographs

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents Note
scopecontent.p: The Overseas Development Council (ODC), disbanded in 2000, was a policy research institution.
These records contain the main organizational records, including financial records, meeting minutes, reports on development proposals, and photographs.
